The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 26 January is 3,225,301 (5,730.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 21 January, there were 227,320 new confirmed cases (403.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 14 January, there were 286,473 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 21% (59,153 fewer cases).
